messages: Patience is a virtue of all programmers
Sometimes taking a walk is the best debug strategy
Don't forget to drink water, programmers are human too

openPortalInstructionCards.header: 1. Type CYOCrawler's IP into a new browser
openPortalInstructionCards.content:
The robot will show a unique IP address on its LED screen (e.g, 192.168.10.200). Use right button to scroll.
Type the IP shown into a new tab on your browser.

openPortalInstructionCards.header: 2. Connect your laptop to the same WiFi
openPortalInstructionCards.content:
Connect your laptop to the same WiFi network that you just input previously.
Now, this IP address has become your personal portal address for this WiFi network.
Next time when you start up the robot, type in the IP address - shown on the robot - into your browser to connect to both portal and WiFi.
